member.name: T:Pixie.Xml.PixieXmlSerializable
member.summary: Defines a base class for XML serializable objects that use markup nodes as an intermediate representation when serializing.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.PixieXmlSerializable.Deserialize(Pixie.IMarkupNode)
member.summary: Deserializes the given markup node into this instance.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.PixieXmlSerializable.Serialize
member.summary: Serializes this instance into a markup node.

member.name: T:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler
member.summary: A helper class that can read and write markup nodes as XML.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.ToMarkupAttributes(System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection)
member.summary: Converts the given XML attribute collection to a Pixie attribute dictionary.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.ToMarkupNodes(System.Xml.XmlNodeList)
member.summary: Converts the given XML node list to a sequence of markup nodes.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.ToMarkupNodes(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1{System.Xml.XmlNode})
member.summary: Converts the given sequence of XML nodes to a sequence of markup nodes.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.CreateMarkupNode(System.String,System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1{Pixie.IMarkupNode})
member.summary: Creates a markup node from the given tag, XML attribute collection, and children (which have already been parsed).

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.ToMarkupNode(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Converts the given XML element to a markup node.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.ToMarkupNode(System.Xml.XmlText)
member.summary: Converts the given XML text node to a markup node.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.ToMarkupNode(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Converts an arbitrary XML node to a markup node. Null is returned if this cannot be done, or just doesn't make sense.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.ReadMarkupNode(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Reads a markup node from the given XML reader, and returns the result.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.WriteMarkupNodeContents(System.Xml.XmlWriter,Pixie.IMarkupNode)
member.summary: Writes the given markup node's contents - that is, the entire markup node, except from its start and end tag - to the given XML writer.

member.name: M:Pixie.Xml.XmlNodeHandler.WriteMarkupNode(System.Xml.XmlWriter,Pixie.IMarkupNode)
member.summary: Writes the given markup node to the given XML writer.
